value.title: Deploy a website with Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to use a Windows or Linux Azure Virtual Machine to extend the website support that Azure provides.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Analyze text with the Text Analytics service
value.excerpt: The Text Analytics service is a cloud-based service that provides advanced natural language processing over raw text for sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, named entity recognition, and language detection.

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

value.title: Read text with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Optical character recognition (OCR) enables artificial intelligence (AI) systems to read text in images, enabling applications to extract information from photographs, scanned documents, and other sources of digitized text.

value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn the basic concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure Azure resources with tools
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to select a tooling option such as Azure portal, Azure PowerShell, Azure CLI, or Azure Cloud Shell.

topItems.title: Use Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: You will learn to use resource groups to organization your organizationâ€™s Azure resources.

topItems.title: Configure resources with Azure Resource Manager templates
topItems.excerpt: Configure resources with Azure Resource Manager templates

topItems.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Create no-code predictive models with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to create and publish machine learning models without writing code.

topItems.title: Use automated machine learning in Azure Machine Learning
topItems.excerpt: Training a machine learning model is an iterative process that requires time and compute resources. Automated machine learning can help make it easier.

topItems.title: Create a Regression Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Regression is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict numeric values. Learn how to create regression models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a classification model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Classification is a supervised machine learning technique used to predict categories or classes. Learn how to create classification models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

topItems.title: Create a Clustering Model with Azure Machine Learning designer
topItems.excerpt: Clustering is an unsupervised machine learning technique used to group similar entities based on their features. Learn how to create clustering models using Azure Machine Learning designer.

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Azure DevOps enables transparency and cooperation with continuous delivery and deployment for your development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to assess efficiency with a value stream map to help you examine your existing release processes and technologies.

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: AZ-104: Manage identities and governance in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage identities and governance in Azure and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure Active Directory including features like AD Join and Self-Service Password Reset.

topItems.title: Configure user and group accounts
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure user and group accounts.

topItems.title: Configure subscriptions
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure subscriptions including obtaining a subscription, implementing cost management, and applying resource tags.

topItems.title: Configure Azure policy
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure Policy to implement compliance requirements.

value.title: Secure access to your applications by using Azure identity services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), multifactor authentication, and Conditional Access can help you manage and secure identities on Azure.

value.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

value.title: Translate text and speech
value.excerpt: Automated translation capabilities in an AI solution enables closer collaboration by removing language barriers.

value.title: Architect infrastructure operations in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor, analyze, and manage the ongoing operation of your infrastructure in Azure.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Implement network security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure, protect, and isolate your networks in Azure.

topItems.title: Secure network connectivity on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure services you can use to help ensure that your network is safe, secure, and trusted.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

topItems.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

value.title: Explore core data concepts
value.excerpt: Explore core data concepts

value.title: AZ-104: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure key Azure network capabilities and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure virtual networks
topItems.excerpt: You will learn to configure virtual networks and subnets, including IP addressing.

topItems.title: Configure network security groups
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to implement network security groups and ensure network security group rules are correctly applied.

topItems.title: Configure Azure DNS
topItems.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure DNS including custom domain names and record sets.

topItems.title: Configure virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: You will learn to configure a VNet peering connection and address transit and connectivity concerns.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 5: Describe identity, governance, privacy, and compliance features
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you secure access to cloud resources, what it means to build a cloud governance strategy, and how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards.

topItems.title: Secure access to your applications by using Azure identity services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Active Directory, single sign-on (SSO), multifactor authentication, and Conditional Access can help you manage and secure identities on Azure.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Examine privacy, compliance, and data protection standards on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft's commitment to privacy, how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards, and additional considerations government agencies need to make.

value.title: Create serverless applications
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Functions that create event-driven, compute-on-demand systems using server-side logic to build serverless architectures.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

topItems.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
topItems.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

topItems.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
topItems.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

topItems.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Deploy a website to Azure with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, get acquainted with using Azure App Service to create and deploy your website without underlying servers, storage or network assets.

topItems.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

topItems.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

topItems.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
topItems.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Deploy and manage compute resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and configure Azure compute resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.excerpt: Learn how to protect and harden your virtual machines in Azure

value.title: Learn how Microsoft supports secure software development as part of a cybersecurity solution
value.excerpt: Secure software development means integrating security into each phase of your development lifecycle, from requirements analysis to maintenance. Microsoft provides many services that can help you develop more secure code and deploy a more secure application in the cloud. This learning path provides an overview of the services and offerings available to help you build secure software as part of a cybersecurity solution.The deadline for agencies to comply with NIST/CISA/OMB guidance on security measures for critical software (including applying practices of least privilege, network segmentation, and proper configuration), per section 4 of the Executive Order on Improving the Nation's Cybersecurity, is **August 10, 2021**. The deadline for agencies to comply with the guidance identifying practices that enhance the security of the software supply chain with respect to software procurement, also per section 4, is **March 8, 2022**.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Security
topItems.excerpt: Discover the tools that Azure provides to help you design a secure environment throughout your infrastructure, data, network, and applications.

topItems.title: Introduction to GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn to use key GitHub features, including issues, notifications, branches, commits, and pull requests.

topItems.title: Maintain a secure repository by using GitHub best practices
topItems.excerpt: Learn best practices for building, hosting, and maintaining a secure repository on GitHub.

value.title: Manage resources in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with the Azure command line and web portal to create, manage, and control cloud based resources.

topItems.title: Align requirements with cloud types and service models in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discover Azure's three approaches to deploying cloud resources -- public, private, and hybrid -- and learn the difference each makes in your Azure services.

topItems.excerpt: Learn the steps to install the Azure CLI locally, create a website, and manage Azure resources using the CLI.

topItems.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

topItems.title: Plan and manage your Azure costs
topItems.excerpt: Migration to the cloud presents new ways to think about your IT expenses. This module teaches you about the factors that influence cost and tools you can use to help estimate and manage your cloud spend.

value.title: Monitor and back up resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and back up Azure resources.

topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: Secure your cloud data
value.excerpt: This learning path helps you leverage the built-in Azure services for securing app data, ensuring that only authorized services and clients have access.

topItems.title: Protect against security threats on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure can help you protect the workloads that you run both in the cloud and in your on-premises datacenter.

topItems.title: Top 5 security items to consider before pushing to production
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Site Reliability Engineering approach to the challenge of assuring reliability and gain a better understanding of why it matters.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Store data in Azure
value.excerpt: This learning path gets you started with the basics of storage management in Azure, Storage Account creation, and choices for data storage.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how using Azure Storage, Azure SQL Database, and Azure Cosmos DB - or a combination of them - for your business scenario is the best way to get the most performant solution.

topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.excerpt: Create a simple application and add configuration, client library references, and C# or JavaScript code to connect it to Azure Storage.

topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: Examine privacy, compliance, and data protection standards on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft's commitment to privacy, how Azure adheres to common regulatory and compliance standards, and additional considerations government agencies need to make.

value.title: Learn how Microsoft supports cloud adoption as part of a cybersecurity solution
value.excerpt: The cloud fundamentally changes everything. Traditionally, ownership and responsibility for all aspects of the technology you use, from infrastructure to software, has fallen to enterprises. When you move to the cloud, you can instead provision and consume just the resources you need, when you need them. Although the cloud offers tremendous flexibility, to get the most benefit out of your move to the cloud, you need a proven and consistent methodology for adopting cloud technologies. The Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure meets that need, helping guide decisions throughout cloud adoption. This learning path provides an overview of the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure and how to use it as part of a cybersecurity solution.The deadline for agencies to update plans for federal network infrastructure, including adoption of cloud technology, and report those plans to OMB/NSC, per Section 3 of the Executive Order on Improving the Nation's Cybersecurity, is **July 11, 2021**.

topItems.title: Getting started with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework for Azure
topItems.excerpt: CAF getting started. Use the Cloud Adoption Framework getting started guides to unblock your organizationâ€™s cloud adoption efforts
